title: How do mastery grades work?
body:
So i'm a mastery 5 hecarim player. I'm level 30 and I play with lower level friends. However to get mastery 6 I need a S-, I got my first one easy enough, but every game apart from that, i've gone 24/3/11 or something along those lines and only gotten an a+ or a-. Last game I went 14/2/5 with 81 cs and got a b+. What even is league of legends.
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body:
30/8/10 and I got an A.

Gg lol is actually stupid.
